attributes.background: The government have continually shunned Mr Farage, he has for over 20 years fought for the independence of Great Britain, without Nigel Farage this referendum would never have happened. The people have spoken and agree. He therefore should be given the highest honour for his life's work

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
